title: Testing AISummarizer against Live Class folder
details:
Testing the AISummarizer fix against the Operations Management Live Class folder. The original error was "The function identifier is empty" when processing video files with Semantic Kernel template substitution.

Test folder: C:\Users\danshue.REDMOND\OneDrive\Education\MBA-Resources\Value Chain Management\Operations Management\operations-management-organization-and-analysis\04_inventory-management-applications\Live Class

Expected behavior: The AISummarizer should now handle template variable substitution correctly without leaving empty function identifiers that cause Semantic Kernel to fail.
